jam.data
Class DataParameter

java.lang.Object
  jam.data.DataParameter
public class DataParameter
extends java.lang.Object

Class for user-defined numerical parameters that can be used during sorting. Jam creates a dialog box for the user to enter values for these parameters. In a sort routine you use parameter.getValue() to get the value entered into the dialog box.

Since:
JDK1.1
Version:
0.9
Author:
Ken Swartz
See Also:
RunControl
